tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığı olanın umudu, umudu olanın her şeyi vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Gücün ve mutluluğun temeli sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığınızı ve refahınızı daha ileriye taşımak için, nefes çalışmasından daha güçlü veya daha basit tek bir günlük uygulama yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Andrew Weil

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlıklı olmak istiyorsan az ye, saygın olmak istiyorsan az konuş.
tr_quotes.author: Özbek Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Bedenimizi hasta eden ruhumuzun baskısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalık dediğin şey atla gelir yaya gider.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Heyse

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlıktan büyük zenginlik yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Bedenimizi hasta eden ruhumuzun baskısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalıklar kötü zevklerin ücretidirler.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyanın en iyi doktorları perhiz sükut ve neşedir.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

tr_quotes.quote: Gücün ve mutluluğun temeli sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalığa tutulmamak hasta olup da iyileşmekten daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Erasmus

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalık hissedilir de sağlık hissedilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Çok fazla yiyip içerek kendi kalbinize yüklenmeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sağlam bilen hastanın tedavisi olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Eddy Fisher

tr_quotes.quote: Öyle tedaviler vardır ki hastalığın kendisinden daha kötüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Publilius Cyrus

tr_quotes.quote: Sevebilen ve çalışabilen insan sağlıklıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimseye imandan sonra sağlıktan daha üstün bir nimet verilmemiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ebubekir

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer insan kendi biyolojisine dikkat etmezse biyolojisi onun hakkından gelecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Park

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığı olanın umudu, umudu olanın her şeyi var demektir
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir memleket halkının sağlığı hakikaten bir devletin dayandığı bütün mutluluk ve gücün temelidir.
tr_quotes.author: George Sand

tr_quotes.quote: İki şeyin elden gitmeden değerini takdir etmek zordur: Biri sağlık öteki de gençliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar önce para kazanmak için sağlıklarını sonra da sağlıklarını korumak için paralarını harcarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyadaki bütün paralar sana sağlığı geri alamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Reba McEntire

tr_quotes.quote: Bedenimizde görülen bazı hastalıklar ruhlarımızda saklanan hastalıkların küçük parçalarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawtborne

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalık insanı ilgilendirmemen onu bilmezlikten gelmeliyiz üzerinde durulmayı hak eden yalnızca sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığın başlangıcı hastalığı tanımaktır
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Halk içinde muteber bir nesne yok devlet gibi olmaya devlet cihanda bir nefes sıhhat gibi.
tr_quotes.author: Kanuni Sultan Süleyman

tr_quotes.quote: Huzur içinde yaşayan mesut olan bir felakete uğramadıkça o huzur ve saadetin kıymetin bilmez. İnsan hasta olmadıkça sağlığı takdir etmez.
tr_quotes.author: Sadi Şirazi

tr_quotes.quote: İki niyetim vardır ki insanların çoğu onların kıymetini hakkıyla takdir edemezler. Onlardan biri sıhhat diğeri de boş vakittir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığınızı tükeninceye kadar kullanın sağlık bunun içindir neyiniz varsa bitirin ölmeden önce ve sakın aşmaya kalkmayın yaşam sürenizi.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalıkları eritmek hususunda en kuvvetli tabip neşeli düşüncelerdir. Kederlere ve ıstıraplara galebe çalacak en büyük teselli de güzel niyetlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, iyi bir sıhhat ve kötü bir hafızadan fazlası değildir
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlık gibi dost, hastalık gibi düşman yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlıktan büyük zenginlik yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Her mutluluğun temeli iyi sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlıklı değilsen, bal bile zehir gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Hastalık hissedilir de sağlık hissedilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Alvan T. Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Hasta olmayan, sağlığın kıymetini bilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Türk Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir sağlık varlıklı olmaktan değerlidir.
tr_quotes.author: İngiliz Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Gücün ve mutluluğun temeli sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Akıldan iyi zenginlik, sağlıktan kıymetli şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Türk Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük servetin nedir bilir misin? Gülen bir arkadaş, kendini iyi hissettiren bir dost ve vücudundaki sıhhat.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Emniyetli yaşamak ve sağlıklı olmak iki büyük nimettir ki, insanlardan pek çoğu bu iki nimetten mahrumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilge bir insan sağlığın insani nimetler için en iyisi olduğunu düşünmeli ve hastalıklarından nasıl faydalanabileceğini kendi düşüncesiyle öğrenmelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Hipokrat

tr_quotes.quote: Enerji seviyeniz ne kadar yüksek olursa, vücudunuz o kadar verimli olur. Vücudunuz ne kadar verimli olursa, kendinizi o kadar iyi hissedersiniz ve üstün sonuçlar elde etmek için yeteneğinizi daha fazla kullanırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Neşeli bir kalp ilaç gibi iyidir, ama kırılmış bir ruh kemikleri kurutur.
tr_quotes.author: Yahudi Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarını iyileştirmeden önce, kendini iyileştir.
tr_quotes.author: Gambiya Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Sevebilen ve çalışabilen insan sağlıklıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

tr_quotes.quote: Kalp rahatken vücut sağlıklıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

en_quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: My personal goals are to be happy, healthy and to be surrounded by loved ones
en_quotes.author: Kiana Tom

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset
en_quotes.author: Arlen Specter

en_quotes.quote: Maintaining good health should be the primary focus of everyone
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health
en_quotes.author: Ric Flair

en_quotes.quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account
en_quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

en_quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: The health of the eye seems to demand a horizon. We are never tired, so long as we can see far enough
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost; when health is lost, something is lost; when character is lost, all is lost
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: True silence is the rest of the mind, and is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

en_quotes.quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: I know a man who gave up smoking, drinking, sex, and rich food. He was healthy right up to the day he killed himself
en_quotes.author: Johnny Carson

en_quotes.quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier
en_quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

en_quotes.quote: Health is your greatest wealth, so experiencing a marathon and seeing what you're capable of is really special
en_quotes.author: Christy Turlington

en_quotes.quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Engaged, enthusiastic, and loyal employees are pivotal drivers of growth and health in any organization
en_quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

en_quotes.quote: You can't take good health for granted
en_quotes.author: Jack Osbourne

en_quotes.quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise
en_quotes.author: Gene Tunney

en_quotes.quote: A child's mental health is just as important as their physical health and deserves the same quality of support
en_quotes.author: Kate Middleton

en_quotes.quote: My goal is to stay in good health, and every day, I wake up and pray that I do
en_quotes.author: Keala Settle

en_quotes.quote: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable
en_quotes.author: Knute Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Vaccines are the tugboats of preventive health
en_quotes.author: William Foege

en_quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: America's health care system is neither healthy, caring, nor a system
en_quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

en_quotes.quote: Health is the vital principle of bliss, and exercise, of health
en_quotes.author: James Thomson

en_quotes.quote: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Natural forces within us are the true healers of disease
en_quotes.author: Hippocrates

en_quotes.quote: Tis healthy to be sick sometimes
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: You're in pretty good shape for the shape you are in
en_quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

en_quotes.quote: AI will impact every industry on Earth, including manufacturing, agriculture, health care, and more
en_quotes.author: Fei-Fei Li

en_quotes.quote: Laziness works. And the simple way to incorporate its health benefits into your life is simply to take a nap
en_quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

en_quotes.quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: Every evil is a sickness of soul, but virtue offers the cause of its health
en_quotes.author: Saint Basil

en_quotes.quote: Since losing my health, I also feel strongly about making each new day worthwhile
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Hadid

en_quotes.quote: Therefore in medicine we ought to know the causes of sickness and health
en_quotes.author: Avicenna

en_quotes.quote: What some call health, if purchased by perpetual anxiety about diet, isn't much better than tedious disease
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: We are all ill: but even a universal sickness implies an idea of health
en_quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

en_quotes.quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health
en_quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

en_quotes.quote: Health is the soul that animates all the enjoyments of life, which fade and are tasteless without it
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year
en_quotes.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

en_quotes.quote: It's so important that we all speak up on mental health
en_quotes.author: Anne-Marie

en_quotes.quote: With happiness as with health: to enjoy it, one should be deprived of it occasionally
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: By improving health, empowering women, population growth comes down
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: The first wealth is health
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: I heard a definition once: Happiness is health and a short memory! I wish I'd invented it, because it is very true
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: Knowing your HIV status is so important for your future health and that of your loved ones
en_quotes.author: David Furnish

en_quotes.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: It is not good not to have health insurance; that leaves the family very vulnerable
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

en_quotes.quote: The healthy man does not torture others - generally it is the tortured who turn into torturers
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: I've always had good energy; I've always had good health
en_quotes.author: Dick Gephardt

en_quotes.quote: Decades of scientific research has proven that carbon pollution is harmful to human health and causes global warming
en_quotes.author: Jeff Merkley

en_quotes.quote: Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: My good health is due to a soup made of white doves. It is simply wonderful as a tonic
en_quotes.author: Chiang Kai-shek

en_quotes.quote: Mental health needs a great deal of attention. It's the final taboo and it needs to be faced and dealt with
en_quotes.author: Adam Ant

en_quotes.quote: The only secret to food combination is a balance of protein, carbs and fat - they all play a key role in our health
en_quotes.author: Jorge Cruise

en_quotes.quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: In a disordered mind, as in a disordered body, soundness of health is impossible
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Taking care of your mental and physical health is just as important as any career move or responsibility
en_quotes.author: Mireille Guiliano

en_quotes.quote: Illegal immigration costs taxpayers $45 billion a year in health care, education, and incarceration expenses
en_quotes.author: Ric Keller

en_quotes.quote: I am in very good health. I've never felt better
en_quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

en_quotes.quote: The wellness and prevention market will outgrow the health care market
en_quotes.author: Leroy Hood

en_quotes.quote: I treat health and fitness as looking after myself
en_quotes.author: Iskra Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: My motivation has always been health - eating healthy and taking care of myself
en_quotes.author: Gabrielle Reece

en_quotes.quote: I think the most important thing we can teach our kids for their long-term health and happiness is how to cook
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: Drones watch for disease and collect real-time data on crop health and yields
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: Getting people health insurance is a good thing, and that's what Tom Stemberg fought for
en_quotes.author: Mitt Romney

en_quotes.quote: America's health care system is the most complicated and expensive in the world
en_quotes.author: Christy Turlington

en_quotes.quote: I sit on my duff, smoke cigarettes and watch TV. I'm not exactly a poster girl for healthy living
en_quotes.author: Lexa Doig

en_quotes.quote: The essence of global health equity is the idea that something so precious as health might be viewed as a right
en_quotes.author: Paul Farmer

en_quotes.quote: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens
en_quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

en_quotes.quote: What can be added to the happiness of a man who is in health, out of debt, and has a clear conscience?
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: Love is not as important as good health. You cannot be in love if you're not healthy. You can't appreciate it
en_quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: We need to change the culture of this topic and make it OK to speak about mental health and suicide
en_quotes.author: Luke Richardson

en_quotes.quote: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters
en_quotes.author: Robin Wright

en_quotes.quote: Having insurance doesn't guarantee good health outcomes, but it is a critical factor
en_quotes.author: Irwin Redlener

en_quotes.quote: I'm interested in women's health because I'm a woman. I'd be a darn fool not to be on my own side
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together
en_quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

en_quotes.quote: The health effects of air pollution imperil human lives. This fact is well-documented
en_quotes.author: Eddie Bernice Johnson

en_quotes.quote: It's no longer a question of staying healthy. It's a question of finding a sickness you like
en_quotes.author: Jackie Mason

en_quotes.quote: The greatest of follies is to sacrifice health for any other kind of happiness
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Attention to health is life's greatest hindrance
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Abortion is not health care. A woman has a right to her body, but that is not her body. What about the baby?
en_quotes.author: Alveda King

en_quotes.quote: Health and fitness is who I am. It's what I do
en_quotes.author: Lee Haney

en_quotes.quote: Make hunger thy sauce, as a medicine for health
en_quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

en_quotes.quote: The rise of childhood obesity has placed the health of an entire generation at risk
en_quotes.author: Tom Vilsack

en_quotes.quote: Water is life, and clean water means health
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Water, air, and cleanness are the chief articles in my pharmacy
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Change the way we all talk to each other about our mental health
en_quotes.author: Kate Middleton

en_quotes.quote: Mental health isn't all of me, but it's a massive part of my journey and a massive part of my whole being
en_quotes.author: Adwoa Aboah

en_quotes.quote: One of the best aspects of health care reform is it starts to emphasize prevention
en_quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

en_quotes.quote: Health care costs are an issue both for the government and for our larger economy
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

en_quotes.quote: Climate change is an economic, public health, and environmental issue that we have a moral responsibility to address
en_quotes.author: Brad Schneider

en_quotes.quote: Give a man health and a course to steer, and he'll never stop to trouble about whether he's happy or not
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years
en_quotes.author: Junipero Serra

en_quotes.quote: I don't allow the stress of the unknown to affect my health, and I listen to my body when it sends me distress signals
en_quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

en_quotes.quote: I feel pretty good. My body actually looks like an old banana, but it's fine
en_quotes.author: Mike Piazza

en_quotes.quote: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness
en_quotes.author: Elaine MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: Obesity affects every aspect of a people's lives, from health to relationships
en_quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: I received free health care
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: I want to be very clear: I will not sign on to any health plan that adds to our deficits over the next decade
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: I believe in universal health care. And I am not afraid to say so
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Capital is reckless of the health or length of life of the laborer, unless under compulsion from society
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: A person whose mind is quiet and satisfied in God is in the pathway to health
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: Overnight stardom can be harmful to your mental health. Yeah. It has ruined a lot of people
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing
en_quotes.author: Redd Foxx

en_quotes.quote: Public health and safety are my highest priorities
en_quotes.author: Kate Brown

en_quotes.quote: Health care should be a right; it should never be a privilege. We should have Medicare for all in this country
en_quotes.author: Kirsten Gillibrand

en_quotes.quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside
en_quotes.author: Robert Urich

en_quotes.quote: America doesn't have health insurance
en_quotes.author: Joe Biden

en_quotes.quote: The literature associating inequality with social instability and poor health outcomes is pretty convincing
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: It is better to lose health like a spendthrift than to waste it like a miser
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: I figure if I have my health, can pay the rent and I have my friends, I call it 'content.'
en_quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

en_quotes.quote: Perfect freedom is as necessary to the health and vigor of commerce as it is to the health and vigor of citizenship
en_quotes.author: Patrick Henry

en_quotes.quote: Health to the ocean means health for us
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

en_quotes.quote: My health is the No. 1 concern and my longevity is the No. 1 concern
en_quotes.author: Alonzo Mourning

en_quotes.quote: If you think health care is expensive now, just wait 'til it's free
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: My main goal is to stay healthy because when you're injured you realise how lucky you are to have your health
en_quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

en_quotes.quote: For sleep, riches and health to be truly enjoyed, they must be interrupted
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Quit worrying about your health. It will go away
en_quotes.author: Robert Orben

en_quotes.quote: I've always wanted to be in the health and wellness business. I try to encourage people to live a healthy lifestyle
en_quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

en_quotes.quote: The World Health Organization has recognized acupuncture as effective in treating mild to moderate depression
en_quotes.author: Andrew Weil

en_quotes.quote: The more easily digestible and refined the carbohydrates, the greater the effect on our health, weight and well-being
en_quotes.author: Andrew Weil

en_quotes.quote: Water and sanitation has not had the same kind of champion that global health, and even education, have had
en_quotes.author: Jim Yong Kim

en_quotes.quote: The ingredients of health and long life, are great temperance, open air, easy labor, and little care
en_quotes.author: Philip Sidney

en_quotes.quote: High blood pressure is a major health crisis in the black community
en_quotes.author: Lamman Rucker

en_quotes.quote: For me, health starts from the mind, and it really does start from the inside out
en_quotes.author: Iskra Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: Dealing with the health of people is more important than political considerations
en_quotes.author: Gerhard Herzberg

en_quotes.quote: Hey 'Bachelor,' take notes! Trusting one another and sharing a journey to health leads to lasting relationships!
en_quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

en_quotes.quote: I am all about health... and to me, size is not what defines your health
en_quotes.author: Teri Hatcher

en_quotes.quote: If you can be well without health, you may be happy without virtue
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Connectivity enables transparency for better government, education, and health
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: In low-income countries, getting to a health post is hard. It's very expensive
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: Even families with health insurance are quite vulnerable to a severe economic reversal if someone gets sick
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

en_quotes.quote: Medicine to produce health must examine disease; and music, to create harmony must investigate discord
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: Parks represent an efficient, cost-effective way to improve public health
en_quotes.author: Chuck Norris

en_quotes.quote: No Minnesotan should ever experience preventable health risks from breathing polluted air or from drinking unsafe water
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: Americans want jobs. They want affordable health insurance. They want an education
en_quotes.author: John McCain

en_quotes.quote: Health insurance should be a given for every citizen
en_quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

en_quotes.quote: I find it a lot healthier for me to be someplace where I can go outside in my bare feet
en_quotes.author: James Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Health and wellness does mean different things to different people
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: There is no limit to how much health you can provide people
en_quotes.author: Yuval Noah Harari

en_quotes.quote: It's bizarre that the produce manager is more important to my children's health than the pediatrician
en_quotes.author: Meryl Streep

en_quotes.quote: The state of the health of the individual is equivalent to the state to the health of the colon
en_quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

en_quotes.quote: Our understanding of how DNA informs our health and development is advancing at an incredible pace
en_quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

en_quotes.quote: Renewable energy could reduce emissions but also create jobs and improve public health
en_quotes.author: Paul Polman

en_quotes.quote: The more you worry, the more you throw off the delicate balance of hormones required for health
en_quotes.author: Andrew J. Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: We have seen that two heads are better than one when dealing with a mental health problem
en_quotes.author: Kate Middleton

en_quotes.quote: If you don't have your health, you don't have anything
en_quotes.author: Chuck Pagano

en_quotes.quote: I never intended on starting a charity; I never intended on cancer, health, and wellness becoming my life
en_quotes.author: Yael Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Strictly' has taught me that activity outside work is good for my mental health
en_quotes.author: Stacey Dooley

en_quotes.quote: Whole Foods has a good health care plan
en_quotes.author: John Mackey

en_quotes.quote: Our goal is to make Maine the healthiest state in the nation and reduce our overall health care costs
en_quotes.author: John Baldacci

en_quotes.quote: I eat really healthy, and if I'm tired, I take a nap
en_quotes.author: Casper Van Dien

en_quotes.quote: A rite of passage in America when you turn 50 and have good health insurance is a colonoscopy
en_quotes.author: Brad Feld

en_quotes.quote: I am now almost certain that we need more radiation for better health
en_quotes.author: John Cameron

en_quotes.quote: One reason for high health care costs is that patients fail to follow their treatment regimen
en_quotes.author: Richard Thaler

en_quotes.quote: I pay for homeowner's insurance, I pay for car insurance, I pay for health insurance
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren
